test.name: Search a product with a category

kw.name: Open the browser and navigates to homepage
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: When User search for a product Apple watch with category Electronics
kw.sourcename: User search for a product ${product} with category ${category}

kw.name: Hello World
kw.msg: Hello world! This is my first keyword

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Apple watch' into text field 'id:twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:searchDropdownBox' by label Electronics.

kw.name: Then User gets a list of products
Print All Products From List

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${productText} = Apple Watch Series 7 (GPS, 41mm) - Blue Aluminium Case with Abyss Blue Sport Band - Regular 788 ₹41,900 Flat INR 3000 Off on ICICI Credit... Get it by Today, March 12 FREE Delivery by Amazon

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Apple Watch Series 7 (GPS, 41mm) - Blue Aluminium Case with Abyss Blue Sport Band - Regular 788 ₹41,900 Flat INR 3000 Off on ICICI Credit... Get it by Today, March 12 FREE Delivery by Amazon

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
